body_html:
My guess is that the Cmake files you need to edit are somewhere here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/c8a45a8e236776bed1d14fd71f3b6755bd63cc58/tensorflow/contrib/cmake, but I actually don't know how our CMake build works :(. Maybe you can pattern match among one of the directories or entries there.

As for current master: you can try bazel clean before rebuilding -- we had to rename the protobuf module cause it was conflicting with external defintions.

body:
My guess is that the Cmake files you need to edit are somewhere here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/c8a45a8e236776bed1d14fd71f3b6755bd63cc58/tensorflow/contrib/cmake, but I actually don't know how our CMake build works :(.  Maybe you can pattern match among one of the directories or entries there.

As for current master: you can try `bazel clean` before rebuilding -- we had to rename the protobuf module cause it was conflicting with external defintions.
